sentences.english: Bow The waiter showed us to our table with much bowingand scraping.
sentences.chinese: 服务员一个劲地点头哈腰领我们就座。

sentences.english: He was bowed into a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 他被点头哈腰地送上出租车。

sentences.english: When everyone saw the mayor, they all bowed obsequiously – he was the only exception.
sentences.chinese: 所有人见到市长都点头哈腰，只有他是个例外。
